reasons.name: Process Ineffiency
reasons.paragraph: Slow and expensive reconciliation processes. Manual operation of interbusiness relationships. Redudant processes across supplies, customers, peers.

reasons.name: Lack of Look-Though
reasons.paragraph: Limited transparency both up and down my supply chain prevening data driven insights. Difficulty in tracking procurement, diliveries and            inventory.

reasons.name: Competitive Relevance
reasons.paragraph: Provide a guide as to what is appropriate under stated conditions of competitive position and nature of the market being operated in

benefits.name: COST EFFICIENCY
benefits.paragraph: Outsourching enables companies to reduce their costs on resource management, overhead cost, labor, working space, etc.

benefits.name: RISK REDUCTION
benefits.paragraph: Outsourching is a way of risk sharing. By outsourcing your software development taks, you are minimizing the risk.

benefits.name: SOCUS ON CORE BUSINESS
benefits.paragraph: Outsourching enable customers to divert their attention from supplementary tasks to focusing on their core functions.
